expected_output: The cluster analysis shows multiple system indices related to OpenSearch's machine learning functionality. All indices have green health status and are properly configured.

Detected a selective failure in productcatalogservice caused by the 'productCatalogFailure' feature flag. Errors are limited to GetProduct requests for product id 'OLJCESPC7Z', with a clear 5xx spike versus the previous 10-minute window; other services are healthy.

Detected a checkout failure caused by the 'paymentServiceUnreachable' feature flag. PaymentService calls from checkoutservice are failing due to an unreachable endpoint (e.g., connection errors/timeouts), resulting in a high failure rate for /checkout requests; other services remain healthy except for downstream effects.

Detected a latency regression and instability in recommendationservice caused by the 'recommendationServiceCacheFailure' feature flag. Spans show increasing duration (p95/p99) and intermittent timeouts; logs indicate cache growth/memory pressure. Impact is primarily localized to recommendation calls with upstream latency side effects.

Detected failures in cartservice caused by the 'cartServiceFailure' feature flag. Errors occur whenever the EmptyCart operation is called; upstream requests involving cart operations show elevated failures, while unrelated services remain healthy.

Detected intermittent failures in adservice consistent with the 'adServiceFailure' feature flag. Errors occur on GetAds roughly 1 out of 10 requests; most ad requests succeed and unrelated services remain healthy.
